docs.text: Venzo Django Starter Pack Welcome to the venzo Django Starter Pack! This starter pack is designed to help you kickstart your Django projects with some essential configurations and features. Getting Started Follow these steps to get your project up and running: Prerequisites Make sure you have the following installed on your machine: - docker - python - pip Install docker https://docs.docker.com/engine/install/ Required packages Python (3.11 or higher) pip flake8 pylint Clone the Repository git clone https://github.com/venzo-tech/venzo_django_starter.git cd venzo_django_starter Install required vs code extensions Open Visual Studio Code on your local machine. Navigate to .devcontainer/devcontainer.json . Press Ctrl + P (Windows/Linux) or Cmd + P (Mac) to open the command palette. Enter > Extensions: Install Extensions and press Enter. Run via docker do the collecstatic and migrations docker-compose run django python manage.py collectstatic docker-compose run django python manage.py makemigrations docker-compose run django python manage.py migrate create superuser if required docker-compose run django python manage.py createsuperuser build and run docker-compose build docker-compose up
docs.title: Home
